title: Campton Mercantile
description: This photo shows the large Campton Mercantile Store. To the right of it is the Steptoe Drug Store. The Drugstore was built in 1908 by the Steptoe Drug Company.
subject: Businesses
source: History of McGill, Nevada website. mcgillnevada.com

title: McGill Drugstore
description: Early photo circa 1912. The McGill Drugstore was built in 1908 and was owned and operated by the Steptoe Drug Co. In 1912 it was changed to the McGill Drugstore. The building to the left of the drugstore was the Campton Mercantile and the McGill Post Office was to the right of the drugstore.
subject: Businesses
source: History of McGill, Nevada website. mcgillnevada.com

title: Leader Store
description: A photo of the east side of McGill main street. The date could be 1912-1915. The Leader Store on the right was in operation in 1914. The large building on the far left is the Clubhouse. The top floor is not finished in this photo. It was completed in 1915-16.
subject: Businesses
source: History of McGill, Nevada website. mcgillnevada.com
